task_description:
{'component_name': 'Main Component', 'description': '**Core Technologies:**
- **Programming Language & Frameworks:** JavaScript with React.js for building dynamic, component-based UI.
- **Database Technologies:** Not explicitly mentioned, but likely JSON or in-memory data structures given the monolithic nature.
- **Runtime Environment:** Node.js with Express.js for server-side operations.
- **Integration Technologies:** RESTful APIs for seamless integration with external systems.
- **UI Technologies:** React.js for UI components, Recharts for interactive charting, and standard CSS for styling.

**Build and Development Tools:**
- **Build System:** Webpack for module bundling and build automation.
- **Development Tools:** Visual Studio Code for code editing, ESLint for code linting, and Prettier for code formatting.
- **Testing Frameworks:** Jest for unit testing, React Testing Library for component testing.
- **Deployment and CI/CD:** Jenkins for continuous integration and deployment, Docker for containerization.', 'interfaces': '', 'algorithms': '', 'pseudocode': '', 'local_backend_service': [], 'asset_images_b64': {}, 'available_assets': []}

Task1.task_description: Initialize project structure and configure development environment
Task1.details: Set up the initial project structure, including necessary configuration files, dependency management, and development tools setup. This includes package.json, webpack configuration, and other essential build tools.

Task1SubTask1.description: Initialize project with npm and create package.json
Task1SubTask1.details: Create package.json with required dependencies including React, Express, Recharts, and development dependencies. Set up basic project structure including src directory.

Task1SubTask2.details: Set up ESLint, Prettier, and Webpack configuration for development workflow. Create configuration files for code formatting and build process.

Task1SubTask3.details: Set up directory structure for frontend and backend components, including src/, public/, and server/ directories.

Task2.task_description: Implement core React application structure and components
Task2.details: Implement the React.js frontend application including main components, routing, and UI structure. Focus on creating reusable components and implementing the burndown chart visualization using Recharts.

Task2SubTask1.details: Set up main React application files including index.js, App.js, and implement basic routing structure

Task2SubTask2.details: Create BurndownChart component using Recharts library for data visualization

Task2SubTask3.details: Implement components for data input, display, and management

Task2SubTask4.details: Create CSS styles for components and implement responsive design

Task3.task_description: Implement backend server and API endpoints
Task3.details: Set up Express.js server with RESTful API endpoints for data management. Implement necessary routes and controllers for handling burndown data.

Task3SubTask1.details: Create basic Express.js server setup with necessary middleware and configuration

Task3SubTask2.details: Create API endpoints for CRUD operations on burndown data

Task3SubTask3.details: Set up data storage and retrieval mechanisms using appropriate data structure

Task4.details: Create comprehensive test suite using Jest and React Testing Library. Implement unit tests for components and integration tests for API endpoints.

Task4SubTask1.details: Configure Jest and React Testing Library, set up test scripts and configuration

Task4SubTask2.details: Create unit tests for React components including the burndown chart and data management components

Task4SubTask3.details: Create integration tests for backend API endpoints
